scripts.install-all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:frontend: npm run ts-check --prefix frontend && npm run lint --prefix frontend && npm run format --prefix frontend
scripts.test:backend: npm run ts-check --prefix backend && npm run lint --prefix backend && npm run format --prefix backend
scripts.postinstall: echo '⚠️ Please install recommended VS Code extensions listed in .vscode/extensions.json'
